name: Creator
explanation: The creator has all rights including the rights to appoint to give or remove the admin role from other users. They can pass on their creator role, but there can only be one person with the creator role per project at a time.

name: Administrator
explanation: The administrator can add or remove members to the project and make update posts.

name: Member
explanation: Members are listed on the team page but cannot add or remove members or make update posts.
